001package io.github.ai4ci.config;
002
003import java.util.Collections;
004import java.util.List;
005
006import org.immutables.value.Value;
007
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
010
011import io.github.ai4ci.abm.Abstraction;
012
013/**
014 * Represents a facet of execution configuration in the JPanSim2 framework. This
015 * interface extends {@link Abstraction.Named} and provides a mechanism to
016 * specify modifications to the baseline execution configuration from
017 * {@link ExperimentConfiguration#getExecutionConfig()}. It is typically used in
018 * batch job configurations to customise execution parameters for different
019 * scenarios or experiments.
020 *
021 * <p>
022 * This class is used in the following contexts:
023 * <ul>
024 * <li>As part of batch job configurations to define execution facets.</li>
025 * <li>In conjunction with {@link BatchConfiguration} to customise simulation
026 * runs.</li>
027 * </ul>
028 *
029 * @author Rob Challen
030 * @see BatchConfiguration
031 */
032@Value.Immutable
033@JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableExecutionFacet.class)
034@JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableExecutionFacet.class)
035public interface ExecutionFacet extends Abstraction.Named {
036        /**
037         * Gets the list of modifications to apply to the execution configuration.
038         * These modifications are used to customise the execution parameters for
039         * specific scenarios or experiments.
040         *
041         * @return A list of {@link PartialExecutionConfiguration} objects
042         *         representing the modifications. Defaults to an empty list if not
043         *         specified.
044         */
045        @Value.Default
046        default List<PartialExecutionConfiguration> getModifications() {
047                return Collections.emptyList();
048        }
049}
